channel.description: Recent content in rust on belijzajac.dev

item.title: Outperforming Rayon with OpenMP
item.description: Whatâ€™s all the fuss about? For my Blockchain Technologies course we had two teams competing against each other to produce the fastest Rust library for kzg commitments. Both of us were using the same backend, that is blst (implemented in assembly but had direct bindings for Rust and C). The first team, blst-from-scratch, were using the said Rust bindings to produce an interface as closer to c-kzg, whereas the second ckzg team, which I was part of, was responsible for porting the latter over to Rust.
